body.name: NUBWO G06 Dual Wireless Gaming Headset with Microphone for PS5, PS4, PC, Mobile, Switch: 2.4GHz Wireless + Bluetooth - 100 Hr Battery - 50mm Drivers - Red
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 1 hr 18 mins
features: Switch between the game and reality seamlessly - G06 simultaneously connects to PC/PlayStation and phones. Without pausing your game, answer or hang up with just a click, or mute by holding for 1 second.

Effortless Wireless Gameplay - Transition from tangled cables to smooth wireless gaming. Leveraging a 2.4GHz connection through its USB dongle, this headset ensures consistent gameplay for PCs and many consoles. Note: Some consoles may not support this wireless feature.

Bluetooth Ready - Experience quick, lag-free audio connectivity. Switch to Bluetooth mode with a simple 2-tap and enjoy your favorite media seamlessly. Keep in mind: Microphone functionality may vary in Bluetooth mode depending on the device.

Wired Connection Supported - For those preferring a wired setup, connect to various gaming devices using a standard 3.5mm cable. Some systems may require additional adapters (not included). Note: Microphone mute feature may vary in wired mode.

Extended Gameplay Hours - Stay in the game longer with up to 100 hours of battery life. When it's time to recharge, be back to full power in just 4 hours. Elevate your gaming sessions with a headset that's designed for endurance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Never Miss a Call Utilize dual wireless tech to game and stay call-alert. Never miss important calls while immersed in esports, seamlessly balancing both worlds.

Previous page Elevate Your Audio Experience with 50mm Drivers! Transform your listening with our 50mm drivers - dive into unparalleled audio immersion. Endless Audio Adventure Awaits Play 3 hours daily; our device lasts a month on a single charge, ensuring non-stop fun! Comfort Meets Quality in Gaming Octagonal mesh fabric ear pads: Experience supreme comfort and smoothness. Instantly Synced, Perfectly Timed. Next-gen wireless tech: Dive into your gaming world with seamless, lag-free enjoyment. Focused Clarity, Reduced Noise Unidirectional mic filters ambient noise, capturing your voice clearly in a direct, focused manner. Next page 1 50mm Drivers 2 100 Hours of Power 3 Fabric Ear Pads 4 Zero Lag 5 Unidirectional Microphone

Can the wireless function of the NUBWO G06 be used with Xbox? No, it cannot. It only supports wired mode when connecting with a controller. Why can't I connect to the wireless function on the first use? The first time you use it, it requires more than 10 seconds for pairing. How do I use the call alert feature? Connect the headset to the console with the 2.4Ghz dongle. Press the power button twice for Bluetooth mode, pair with your phone, then press twice again to revert to wireless. This connects the headset to both the console and phone for call alerts. How do I switch modes? The headset starts in 2.4Ghz wireless mode by default. You can switch between wireless and Bluetooth modes by pressing the power button twice. Can I play while charging? For electrical safety, the G06 cannot be used while charging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT PRICE AND QUALITY!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these headphones for my son with doubts and it turns out that I was surprised by the quality and sound for the very affordable price. I recommend them 100% because the sound and comfort in the ears is excellent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't have super high expectations for this headset because it's from a brand I'm unfamiliar with and it's a very low price compared to other headsets.This headset is surprisingly comfortable, easy to use, and functions perfectly. The only minor nitpick is that the plastic feels very thin and I don't know if they're durable and will stand up to use over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s actually a 1 star
reviews.reviewText: Do not buy this cheap mic, it’s not worth it just spend the extra 25-50 on a better one. Cheap earmuff, using the usb is the only option using bluetooth makes it sound horrible. and ever since I plugged the usb into my pc it’s been interfering with my controller (I tried with 3 different controllers and they all did the same) and causing my cod screen and rocket league to spin in circles. Horrible mic but i’m gonna deal with it b/c i don’t feel like returning lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent heaphones for the price
reviews.reviewText: They were a Christmas gift to myself. My old ps4 gold headphones are still great. But, I wanted new ones for my ps5. The battery was charged out the box. It came with all the USB and 3.5 mm phone jack cords. Connection was simple with the dongle. Some people have said its not compatible with the ps5. It connected to mine with ZERO issues. As far as sound quality, they sound as good as my old ps4 gold headphones. The mic is super sensitive. And they are very comfortable. Great for call of duty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great sound. The mic is great works well. Battery last very long. I haven’t charged it in about a month and it still has a charge. It is very comfortable.100% recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Microphone didn’t work with Switch when docked
reviews.reviewText: We got these specifically for the Switch and we couldn’t get the microphone to work with it. You could plug the headset into the Switch itself and the microphone would work, but if you dock the Switch and plug these into the dock, the microphone doesn’t work. Or if you plug these into a wired controller with a headphone jack, that doesn’t work either. We know Switch doesn’t support Bluetooth microphones, but this is wired, so it should have worked. The audio output worked fine in all cases, it was just the input. Unfortunately we had to return them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The headset was for my son and he found it very comfortable on his head. The battery life is great and the setup is really easy. The sound quality is great aswell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it. I send it back next day
reviews.reviewText: When playing game with headset and volume up all the way, cant hear the game good but you can hear people talking loud and clear and it wired to controller. It say it wireless, but it a-lot quiet. People say it echo when im talking. Plus headset is not comfy.

Hochpreisige Headsets müssen sich da schon sehr weit aus dem Fenster lehnen, um ihre hohen Preise zu rechtfertigen. Bin sehr überrascht von dem Preisleistungsverhältnis, es ist zwar vieles aus Kunststoffe dennoch kein Müll. Das Andocken ging sehr schnell und ohne Probleme. Eine gut lesbare deutsche Gebrauchsanweisung lag auch dabei. Für das Gaming vollkommen ausreichend, Sprachqualität außerordentlich gut. Kurz und knapp, für daheim eine gute Investition um eben schnell eine Runde zu zocken oder Musik zu hören. Wer Stil und höhere Qualität bevorzugt, solle die Finger davon lassen und muss leider tiefer in die Tasche greifen.

reviews.reviewTitle: 布製って少ないですよね。
reviews.reviewText: ①耳当て部分がオーバーイヤーで布製②USB無線で接続が可能この二点で探してこの製品を買いました。結果満足しています。USB無線接続のほうは遅延がほぼありません。BT接続の場合は0.5秒くらいの遅延があり、さすがに気になりますね。音質は普通。ガチ勢には物足りないかも。充電開始すると強制で電源OFFになります。買ったばかりなので耐久性は不明です。

Mir was es wichtig, ein Headset multifunktional zu verwenden und nicht nur für einen einzigen Einsatz.An die Playstation 5 habe ich es mit dem mitgelieferten USB-Stick direkt angeschlossen und an den anderen Geräten (TV, PC, etc.) möchte ich es per Bluetooth nutzen.Das weiße Design passt super zur Playstation und wirkt neben den Controllern wie, als würde es aus einem Karton stammen, bzw. dazu gehören.Im Lieferumfang ist noch ein Audi-Stecker für einen direkten Anschluss per Klinke dabei.Die Tonqualität ist für mein Empfinden super, wobei ich keinen Vergleich zu 200-300,-€ Head-Sets habe.Auch die Polsterung und der Tragekomfort ist ganz gut.Im Angebot, für ca. 50,-€ gekauft, finde ich das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis auch top.Lediglich eine Akkuanzeige würde ich mir wünschen. Im Moment lade ich nach Gefühl auf, so alle 5-7 St. Spielzeit, bei mittlerer Lautstärke. Von alleine ausgegangen (Akku leer) ist es mir bisher noch nicht.

Son para la ps4 y funcionan correctamente. En cuanto al volumen del micro se escuchaba bajo, pero no es por los auriculares, sino por los ajustes de la ps4, en los que puedes subir el volumen del micrófono.

Lässt sich mit Bluetooth über TV, PS5, PC,... leicht verbinden. Wenn beim TV am Anfang die Verbindung mit Bluetooth nicht funktionert, was bei mir der Fall war, dann zuerst mit den Kopfhörerstecker probieren und dann überblooth. Es ist sehr gemütlich und super Klang. Am Blackfriday um guten Preis erwischt.
